articles.description: Football behind closed doors will become a regular feature in the coming weeks
articles.content:
Uefa chief Aleksander Ceferin has revealed when he thinks fans will return to stadiums.
Football remains halted in England and for the most part, across Europe with Bundesliga the only one of the top five leagues to return. 
But even German football has ret… [+1719 chars]

articles.author: Ian Doyle
articles.title: Liverpool's greatest fears are over as Jurgen Klopp gets set to begin again - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Liverpool return to training at Melwood today preparing to begin their challenge for the Premier League title again
articles.content:
This should have been the week when Liverpool were celebrating the end of their long, long wait to be crowned champions of England.
Instead, Jurgen Klopp and his players will be content with knowing their Premier League title challenge is tentatively getting… [+2599 chars]

articles.title: Jürgen Klopp interview | The boss discusses day one back at Melwood - Liverpool FC
articles.description: Jürgen Klopp detailed the positive start to Liverpool's return to training – and the plans for the forthcoming period – as his players and staff came back to Melwood on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Jürgen Klopp detailed the positive start to Liverpool's return to training and the plans for the forthcoming period as his players and staff came back to Melwood on Wednesday.

articles.author: Reece Chambers
articles.title: Liverpool should consider signing player Reds fans raved about earlier this season - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Liverpool will know all too well of Hwang Hee-Chan's capabilities after his goal and assist at Anfield in the Champions League
articles.content:
The next transfer window is set to be dominated by financial uncertainty and limited spending for the vast majority of clubs.

articles.description: Inglis is returning to the sport with Warrington Wolves
articles.content:
